property.name: description
property.value:
The Plugins SDK is deprecated as of Liferay Portal CE 7.0. So, during this upgrade process, you have the following options.

  • Convert your plugins to workspace modules
  • Adapt your Plugins SDK style plugin to use a new legacy Plugins SDK for 7.x
    • This allows you to choose how to best upgrade your plugins inway that works best, either converting to modules to leaveing as traditional plugins. In some cases converting to modules will be recommended (i.e. service-builder portlets) and sometimes it will be required (i.e. custom jsps or ext).
